definitions.title: n. indecl.
definitions.body: sixty;—bef. n. sg.: city De 3:4 + 4 t., cubit 1Ki 6:2, Ez Eze 40:14, man 2Ki 25:19 = Je 52:25, day Le 12:5, etc.; n.pl. [[בָּנוֹת]] 2Ch 11:21, cf. Ct So 3:7; after n.pl. Nu 7:88, Nu 7:88, Nu 7:88, 2Ch 3:3, 2Ch 11:21 +; [[שִׁשִּׁים אֶלֶף]] 2Ch 12:3 +; ´[[שׁ]]: foll. units Ge 5:15 + 12 t.; ´[[שׁ]]: precedes unit Is 7:8 + 12 t.; ´[[שׁ]]: foll. 100 (1000) Ezr 8:10 + 11 t.; precedes Ge 5:18 = 8 t.
